meanings.definition: Shiny or glittering in a bright and sparkly way.
meanings.sent1: The spanglier stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her spanglier dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: The spanglier the disco ball, the more we danced!
meanings.sent4: The spanglier diamonds on her necklace outshone the rest.
meanings.sent5: The spanglier the sun, the more it dazzled us with its light.

meanings.definition: More shiny or glittering than something else.
meanings.sent1: The spanglier necklace was the most eye-catching piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent2: His spanglier shoes outshone all the others on the dance floor.
meanings.sent3: The spanglier the crown, the more regal the queen felt.
meanings.sent4: Her spanglier smile brightened up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The spanglier the fireworks, the more spectacular the show became.
